translations: （皮肤的）皴裂（或皲裂）处；（尤指说话者喜欢的）男人，家伙；（尤指猪头肉的）颔颊部分；（骑马时穿的）皮套裤

phrs.translation: [主英国口语][用作招呼语]老兄，老伙计，老弟[亦称作 old boy， old fellow]

sentences.sentence: He isn't such a bad chap really.
sentences.translation: 他这个家伙并不真的这么坏。

sentences.sentence: "I am a very lucky chap," he com we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao ed. "The doctors were surprised that I was not paralysed."
sentences.translation: “我是个非常幸运的家伙，”他解释说，“医生们都很惊奇我没有瘫痪。”

sentences.sentence: He is a good little chap!
